text: Diogo José Teixeira da Silva (born 4 December 1996), commonly known as Diogo Jota, is a Portuguese footballer. He plays as a winger for Premier League team Liverpool. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup League cup Europe Other
